org.openimaj.image.objectdetection.haar.training

Enum HaarFeatureType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HaarFeatureType>
      • org.openimaj.image.objectdetection.haar.training.HaarFeatureType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<HaarFeatureType>

    public enum HaarFeatureType
extends Enum<HaarFeatureType>
    Definitions of standard haar-like features.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • create

        public abstract HaarFeature create(int x,
                 int y,
                 int dx,
                 int dy,
                 int winWidth,
                 int winHeight)
        Create a feature.
        Parameters:
        x - x-location
        y - y-location
        dx - x-delta
        dy - y-delta
        winWidth - window width
        winHeight - window height
        Returns:
        the new feature, or null if the parameters are out of range.
